body_html: See the discussion on that issue. The problem is most likely caused by the fact that tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer bakes the number of workers into the checkpoint, which is another issue that should probably be addressed.
body_text: See the discussion on that issue. The problem is most likely caused by the fact that tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer bakes the number of workers into the checkpoint, which is another issue that should probably be addressed.
body: See the discussion on that issue. The problem is most likely caused by the fact that `tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer` bakes the number of workers into the checkpoint, which is another issue that should probably be addressed.
